com.gembox.spreadsheet

Class FixedWidthSaveOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gembox.spreadsheet.SaveOptions
      • com.gembox.spreadsheet.FixedWidthSaveOptions

  • public final class FixedWidthSaveOptions
extends SaveOptions
    Represents options for saving to Fixed-Width Text file format.

        public String getContentType()
        Gets the content-type for Fixed-Width Text file format: "text/plain; charset=" + getCharset().name().
        Specified by:

        See Also:

      • getLimitations

        public FileFormatLimitations getLimitations()
        Gets limitations for saving to Fixed-Width Text file format. These are the limits:
        • MaxRows: Integer.MAX_VALUE
        • MaxColumns: Integer.MAX_VALUE
        • MaxColors: Integer.MAX_VALUE
        • MaxCellStyles: Integer.MAX_VALUE
        Specified by:
        getLimitations in class SaveOptions
